content:
# I have successfully inserted 5 units of stone into the furnace, which is now working again and has 4 stones left to smelt. The inventory remains unchanged with 1 stone brick produced.

# I will continue to monitor the furnace until it completes smelting the remaining stones into stone bricks. 
# I will wait for the smelting process to finish and check for the production of stone bricks.

# I will use a similar loop to check for stone bricks produced.
for _ in range(30):  # Wait for a maximum of 30 seconds
    result = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Check the inventory of the furnace
    stone_bricks = result.get(Prototype.StoneBrick, 0)  # Inspect for stone bricks produced
    if stone_bricks > 0:
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After waiting, I will extract any stone bricks produced.
extract_item(Prototype.StoneBrick, furnace.position, quantity=5)  # Extract the stone bricks from the furnace
print(f"Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after extraction.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities again.
